import React from 'react' import FeatherIcon from 'feather-icons-react' import { EtherscanTxLink } from 'lib/components/EtherscanTxLink' import { PTHint } from 'lib/components/PTHint' import { LoadingSpinner } from 'lib/components/LoadingSpinner' export function TransactionsListItem(props) { const { tx } = props const errorIcon = return
  • {tx.hash ? <> {tx.name} : tx.name }
    {!tx.completed && <>
    } {tx.completed && !tx.error && <> } {tx.reason && <> {errorIcon} } {tx.error && !tx.reason && <> {errorIcon} }
    {tx.inWallet && <> {tx.inWallet && <> Please confirm in your wallet... } }
    • }
